title: JSON Defined SpriteSheet
description: Used to define a SpriteSheet (wrapper type for textures)

version.description: The version of the schema used

texture_name.description: The asset file name to be loaded

key.description: A unique identifier for the sprite sheet

frame_width.description: The width of a frame, in pixels

frame_height.description: The height of a frame, in pixels

offset.description: Offset of the origin. (0, 0) by default
